title: new client
body:
Riot can u pls back old client because i cant launch a new client and i cant play lol.Thank you very much 
P.S: can u help me

replies.body: While it's not possible to revert to the legacy client, I'd love to help figure out what's causing this issue!  Can you give me some more details of what's happening exactly?  What are you seeing, what's happening, and are there any errors?  Let me know!
